text:
At #WTFisSRE, @holly_cummins put the focus on the fact that being #automated and having the #scripts did not mean automatically that we know when it's the right moment to #trigger them! It's key to have the data to make the link between behavior and actions...ðŸ¤”

author.name: Philippe Ensarguet
